name: HEC (Commerce-Oriented)
description: Commerce-oriented HEC blend for students wanting economics + commerce with social sciences context. Suitable for teaching, policy, government exams, commerce degrees, and BA Economics/History.

characteristics.target_students: Commerce students who want policy/teaching/government paths
characteristics.aptitude: Reading, reasoning, numeracy, public affairs awareness

progression.after_12th: B.Com / BA Economics / BA History → banking/admin/teaching

advantages: Keeps both commerce and govt exam routes open
History improves essay/current affairs for PSC/UPSC
challenges: Needs self-driven math practice for quant sections
market_demand: High for banking/admin; stable for teaching
